comment._content: At top right is "Chaney." Did someone at Bain change their mind about the boxer's name? Could this be George "KO" Chaney, as at boxrec.com/media/index.php?title=Human:47310 Seems possible. He was certainly active at the time

comment._content: LOC's caption omits the middle initial C. in Laney's name (if this is Laney). If it's Chaney, LOC has omitted the name entirely.
